workflow

Class Triage

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Entity
      • workflow.WorkflowElement
        • workflow.Triage

  • public class Triage
extends WorkflowElement
    This is a class extending WorkflowElement. It represents the triage step. The incoming patients are sent to different rooms, depending on their severity level. The step requires a nurse.
    Author:
    Quentin

    • Method Detail

      • canTreatPatient

        public boolean canTreatPatient(Patient patient)
        This method overrides canTreatPatient of WorkflowElement. It checks if there is an available nurse for registering the patient.
        Specified by:
        canTreatPatient in class WorkflowElement
        Parameters:
        patient - A Patient instance
        Returns:
        boolean: true if the patient can be treated by the service, false otherwise
        See Also:
        WorkflowElement.canTreatPatient(resources.Patient)

      • startServiceOnPatient

        public void startServiceOnPatient(Patient patient)
        This method overrides startServiceOnPatient of WorkflowElement. It finds a nurse for the patient registration. It updates the patient, and the nurse information. Then it adds the end of the registration to the service task queue.
        Specified by:
        startServiceOnPatient in class WorkflowElement
        Parameters:
        patient - A Patient instance

      • endServiceOnPatient

        public void endServiceOnPatient(Patient patient)
        This method overrides endServiceOnPatient of WorkflowElement. It ends the registration of a patient before sending him to the waiting queue of installation. First it updates the patient and the nurse information. Then it adds the patient to the installation waiting queue.
        Specified by:
        endServiceOnPatient in class WorkflowElement
        Parameters:
        patient - A Patient instance
